ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: the reason i got rid of all my lambent and SS was precisely this.  twinks trying to be me!! ok, so what i wear is Imbrued gaunts, bracers, and vambraces...
ygData.messageBody:
the reason i got rid of all my lambent and SS was precisely this. twinks
trying to be me!!

ok, so what i wear is Imbrued gaunts, bracers, and vambraces... (so gold or
whatever from shoulder to finger... nicely uniformed appearance =)

then i have steel bp and greaves. so, to keep the steel look everywhere
else, i have watchmans boots, and a skull shaped barbute... (normally wear
froggy crown for the no graphic cuz i'm so cute =P

steel from neck to toe, and fully golden arms... not a half bad look. not
many twinks aim for that, so it distinguishes me from them at least...

but when i want to look like a dragoon, i put on my shin gaunts, vox bracer
and SSB, equip my martune rapier and RBF in my melee slots, and use my "You
are no match for a dragoon!" hotkey, and walk around Crushbone or WCommons
terrorizing newbies =)

what fun the bard is!

Pava Rahti

p.s. when impersonating an NPC, i use the sneak skill too, to authenticate
it more ;-)
